Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: X-ray diffraction measurements were carried out to determine the crystallinity of PffBB-n polymers and the XRD spectra are shown in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n polymers |

Note: In this paragraph, "PffBB-n polymers" is the only clear material name reference. The other term, "X-ray diffraction measurements" refers to a technique used to analyze materials, not a specific material itself.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: X-ray diffraction measurements were carried out to determine the crystallinity of PffBB-n polymers and the XRD spectra are shown in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystallinity |
| XRD spectra |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "crystallinity" and "XRD spectra". These entities are mentioned as the properties being determined and displayed in the X-ray diffraction measurements.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| crystallinity |

The only valid "Property Name" entity in the paragraph is "crystallinity". The term "XRD spectra" is not a material property, but rather a representation of the diffraction data obtained from the X-ray measurements.
